#generate key pair
ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 2048 -C "Key for Ivanov I.I."
#public key must be in ~/.ssh/authorized_keys as text line
cat id_rsa.pub >> ~/.ssh/authorized_keys
#copy private key to your work machine, use it in putty or other client

#change sshd settings
nano /etc/ssh/sshd_config
RSAAuthentication yes #deprecated in some distros
PubkeyAuthentication yes
PasswordAuthentication no
PermitRootLogin no
service sshd restart/systemctl restart sshd
